column5: OPINIONS / THOUGHTS : PC GPS MARINE NAVIGATION SOFTWARE :   Which Software Title to Purchase ?   LOOKING INTO TITLES :  Navionics NavPlanner2		$150 Fugawi Marine ENC Version 4.5	$250   ** Both Applications provide Navionics Multi Card Reader included ** ** CURRENTLY OWN NAVIONICS PLATINUM CARD **   Would like to view/Analyze/Create/Transfer/Track Waypoints to/From Computer & GPS etc.   Majority/Only "Fishing" to be done on lakes in "ONTARIO" Simcoe,Scugog, Rice,Quinte,some of Georgian bay,  Any Experiences where Issues/problems could Happen ?   Difficult to manage/control/use/understand ?    Thanks for any your help!
